abstract.para: This article lists requirements for deploying &productnameshort;.

section.title: Hardware requirements
section.para: &productnameshort; deployment is supported on the following hardware:

listitem.para: Installing &productnameshort; is supported on hosts with UEFI BIOS only. Hosts with legacy BIOS are not supported.
The maximum number of CPUs supported by software design is 8192.
&productnameshort; requires at least 1 GB RAM. Bear in mind that this is a minimal value for the operating system, the actual memory size depends on the workload.
The minimum hard disk space is 12 GB, while the recommended value is 20 GB of hard disk space. Adjust the value according to the workloads of your containers.

section.title: Virtualized deployment
section.para: When deploying &productnameshort; as a virtual machine guest, you need to have a &vmhost; running one of supported hypervisors and prepare a virtual machine for &productnameshort; deployment.
